Argument.Name: filename
Argument.Description: The name of the file containing the application.

BoolOption.Name: xp
BoolOption.Description: Do not import the properties of the application.

BoolOption.Name: xc
BoolOption.Description: Do not import the capacities of the application.

BoolOption.Name: ip
BoolOption.Description: Do import the properties of the application.

BoolOption.Name: ic
BoolOption.Description: Do import the capacities of the application.

BoolOption.Name: op
BoolOption.Description: Import only the properties of the application.

BoolOption.Name: oc
BoolOption.Description: Import only the capacities of the application.

BoolOption.Name: f
BoolOption.Description: Override existing application. If existing application is used by another runtime context, that runtime context will switch to the newly imported application.

BoolOption.Name: g
BoolOption.Description: On cluster configuration perform the command on all nodes.

BoolOption.Name: r
BoolOption.Description: Generated code inside the application will be regenerated during the import.

BoolOption.Name: iq
BoolOption.Description: If a required runtime context is only present in a different version, the requirement will not be switched to that version, and the import will fail. Default=false.

BoolOption.Name: ncg
BoolOption.Description: If the applicationimport results in (re)-generating the application's code, abort instead

Argument.Name: storableNameGeneration
Argument.Description: abort: Abort import if odsNames of different types collide (default). allow: Allows deviation on name colllsions. exclude: Do not import odsNames.
